text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a borderline sauce no really
maybe a true Bordelaise but a simple

know a Bordelaise is just a red wine

stock demi-glaze in there so here we go
we're going to take four shallots those
russia alit's alright you're going to
find this in the supermarket every

kind of large slices it doesn't matter
because we're going to caramelize these
so we're going to slice our four

cup maybe of shallots I'm going to add

slowly on a medium low heat caramelize
those shallots all right so you're not

out you stir it once in a while and in
about 20 minutes you're going to have
something that looks like that so you
definitely want to get some color on
those they're going to really reduce and
start to sweeten up and caramelize next
goes in our red wine one cup of red wine
now people always want to know do I use

use cooking wine horrible don't use good

alright the wine is getting kind of Sur

down by half
it's going to be about this consistency
you see here I'm going to show you as we

you're going to basically be down to
